text: I contacted support and the answer is that `OBJECT_PROPERTY` is the correct value type for an item coming from a Contact or other object, not `FIELD_DATA`
The new Web Analytic Events API supports 1 & 3, but a portal has to be ungated for it - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/events/web-analytics>

You can do this with any ipass system that allows for creation of oauth connections. They usually handle the oauth flow for you once you're added the client secret, scopes and redirectUri.

Most systems won't have 'wrapped' specific endpoints because each object is custom to the portal itself, but they'll give you a non-wrapped endpoint where you can define the API call path and utilize an existing oauth connection.
For instance, I have a connected oAuth app in Integromat, and then I can make API calls using that connection but passing the custom path of the custom object.
When you're creating a connection, you can paste in the right scopes for your app to ensure they have access to custom objects
That's awesome, thank you for the tip <@UJJ239SC9>!
